${ModID}:CorruptedOrb.NAME: Corrupted Orb
${ModID}:CorruptedOrb.FLAVOR: Demonic power has tainted this orb for the stronger.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces [#c69f6c]Holy [#c69f6c]Orb. At the start of each combat, convert #b1 [E] into #b4 #yMiracles.

${ModID}:HolyOrb.NAME: Holy Orb
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, convert #b1 [E] into #b2 #yMiracles.
